00048 #define CONFIG_TYPE_NONE    0
00049 #define CONFIG_TYPE_GROUP   1
00050 #define CONFIG_TYPE_INT     2
00051 #define CONFIG_TYPE_INT64   3
00052 #define CONFIG_TYPE_FLOAT   4
00053 #define CONFIG_TYPE_STRING  5
00054 #define CONFIG_TYPE_BOOL    6
00055 #define CONFIG_TYPE_ARRAY   7
00056 #define CONFIG_TYPE_LIST    8
00057 
00058 #define CONFIG_FORMAT_DEFAULT  0
00059 #define CONFIG_FORMAT_HEX      1
00060 
00061 #define CONFIG_OPTION_AUTOCONVERT 0x01
00062 
00063 #define CONFIG_TRUE  (1)
00064 #define CONFIG_FALSE (0)
00065 
00066 typedef union config_value_t
00067 {
00068   int ival;
00069   long long llval;
00070   double fval;
00071   char *sval;
00072   struct config_list_t *list;
00073 } config_value_t;
00074 
00075 typedef struct config_setting_t
00076 {
00077   char *name;
00078   short type;
00079   short format;
00080   config_value_t value;
00081   struct config_setting_t *parent;
00082   struct config_t *config;
00083   void *hook;
00084   unsigned int line;
00085   const char *file;
00086 } config_setting_t;
00087 
00088 typedef enum
00089 {
00090   CONFIG_ERR_NONE = 0,
00091   CONFIG_ERR_FILE_IO = 1,
00092   CONFIG_ERR_PARSE = 2
00093 } config_error_t;
00094 
00095 typedef struct config_list_t
00096 {
00097   unsigned int length;
00098   config_setting_t **elements;
00099 } config_list_t;
00100 
00101 typedef struct config_t
00102 {
00103   config_setting_t *root;
00104   void (*destructor)(void *);
00105   unsigned short flags;
00106   unsigned short tab_width;
00107   short default_format;
00108   const char *include_dir;
00109   const char *error_text;
00110   const char *error_file;
00111   int error_line;
00112   config_error_t error_type;
00113   const char **filenames;
00114   unsigned int num_filenames;
00115 } config_t;

00201 #define /* const char * */ config_get_include_dir(/* const config_t * */ C) \
00202   ((C)->include_dir)
00203 
00204 #define /* int */ config_setting_type(/* const config_setting_t * */ S) \
00205   ((S)->type)
00206 
00207 #define /* int */ config_setting_is_group(/* const config_setting_t * */ S) \
00208   ((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_GROUP)
00209 #define /* int */ config_setting_is_array(/* const config_setting_t * */ S) \
00210   ((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_ARRAY)
00211 #define /* int */ config_setting_is_list(/* const config_setting_t * */ S) \
00212   ((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_LIST)
00213 
00214 #define /* int */ config_setting_is_aggregate( \
00215   /* const config_setting_t * */ S)                                     \
00216   (((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_GROUP) || ((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_LIST)  \
00217    || ((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_ARRAY))
00218 
00219 #define /* int */ config_setting_is_number(/* const config_setting_t * */ S) \
00220   (((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_INT)                                       \
00221    || ((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_INT64)                                  \
00222    || ((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_FLOAT))
00223 
00224 #define /* int */ config_setting_is_scalar(/* const config_setting_t * */ S) \
00225   (((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_BOOL) || ((S)->type == CONFIG_TYPE_STRING) \
00226    || config_setting_is_number(S))
00227 
00228 #define /* const char * */ config_setting_name( \
00229   /* const config_setting_t * */ S)             \
00230   ((S)->name)

00232 #define /* config_setting_t * */ config_setting_parent( \
00233   /* const config_setting_t * */ S)                     \
00234   ((S)->parent)
00235 
00236 #define /* int */ config_setting_is_root(       \
00237   /* const config_setting_t * */ S)             \
00238   ((S)->parent ? CONFIG_FALSE : CONFIG_TRUE)
